nodes.text: The Workers, or Workers, were a group comprising members of specific political, economical, and social classes on New Apsolon. As their name implies, they were composed of the poor and the laborers among the New Apsolon population. The Workers were political opponents of the richer class, known as the Civilized, and were involved in overthrowing the Absolutes, who were the dictatorial leaders of New Apsolon.
